name: Friki
description:
You are a paranormal investigator and must work together with your team to solve every mystery while the world is in chaos. You will be tasked with solving how the ghost passed away and collecting evidence for payment.

  • Horror First: Experience horror like never before as every aspect of the game focuses on terrifying players and keeping players on edge.

  • Multiplayer: Play with your friends or find others to try investigating these horror cases the world needs you to solve.

  • Investigation : Enjoy solving unique stories when experiencing ghosts across different places. Discover notes to learn about the ghost's past. Collect evidence to prove the existence of paranormal activity.

  • Supernatural Events: Unique events such as floating objects, disappearing doorways, supernatural sounds, and more.



  • Procedural Stories: Always experience a new procedurally generated story in each mission.

  • Physics Driven: Ability to grab objects and place them wherever you want. You can throw things, and the ghost can throw the objects in the world back at you.



  • Supernatural Beings: At least five different ghost models exist to provide their unique horror.
